name: bj-nfs1v
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| wi(wsb(s1, s0, w0), wal(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| wi(wsb(s1, s0, w0), wal(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s1, s0, w0), wal(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))
-| diffss(s1, s0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| diffss(s1, s0)

|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: Version of ~ nfsb2 with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 , and removal of ~ ax-13 from ~ nfs1v . (Contributed by BJ, 24-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
